snippet: A rabbi who has been fighting to expose sexual abuse cases in the Hasidic community says District Attorney Charles J. Hynes was late to the cause.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column praises Brooklyn District Attorney Charles J Hynes for finally paying attention to scourge of sexual molestation in Hasidic community, convicting Satmar community leader Nechemya Weberman on many counts; Rabbi Nuchem Rosenberg, a member of the community who has spoken out for decades, says Hynes is late to the cause, part of a long silence that gave children no one to turn to.
lead_paragraph: A rabbi who has been fighting to expose sexual abuse cases in the Hasidic community says District Attorney Charles J. Hynes was late to the cause.

headline.seo: In Sexual Abuse Case, Muted Praise From One Corner
headline.main: For Prosecutor in Sexual Abuse Case, Muted Praise From One Corner
headline.print_headline: In Abuse Case, Muted Praise In One Corner
